full_summary:
**outcome assessment of the 2019 Canada’s food guide (2019-CFG)**

**Procurement Reference:** cb-8658-13319251; **Solicitation Number:** 1000250491

**Contracting Authority:** Health Canada, 200 Eglantine Driveway, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1A 0K9; **Phone:** (613)410-5333; **Email:** chantal.laferriere@hc-sc.gc.ca

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Objective**: Health Canada is seeking a contractor to conduct an outcome assessment of the 2019 Canada’s food guide (2019-CFG). The assessment will evaluate awareness, acceptance, integration, and understanding of existing guidance among the general population, health professionals, and policymakers.

**Scope of Work**: The contractor will utilize quantitative and qualitative methods to assess the impact of the 2019-CFG on the population. The assessment will include determining facilitators and barriers to using dietary guidance and identifying factors influencing the adoption and implementation of the guidelines.

**Solicitation Details**:

* **Publication Date:** August 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 13, 2023, at 14:00 EDT
* **Contract Duration:** One year (with one additional one-year option period)
* **Solicitation Method:** Competitive
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**What's Required**: To determine the best contractor, we will evaluate both technical merit and price.

**Attachments**:

* rfp-1000250491-english-final.pdf
* rfp1000250491-french.pdf
* qa-1-(1).pdf
* qa-2-(5).pdf

**Contact Information:** For any inquiries or questions, please contact Chantal Laferriere, Contracting Authority, at (613)410-5333 or chantal.laferriere@hc-sc.gc.ca.
